description.displayText: Kathia has been my caregiver for the past 8 years unfortunately my kids are all grown now and I don't longer need a full time care...I know Kathia is the perfect fit for any family as she was for mine! She's been so wonderful through all these years with us and we're truly sorry that she's leaving us but we understand that her time with our family has come to an end. She was the best addition to our family for this past 8 years! She wasn't only an employee but she was also a part of our family. I can promise you that Kathia is the best choice you can make when hiring a caregiver! She's the best! We will truly miss her!

description.displayText: Kathia is very sweet girl. She's wonderful. I always ask her to come babysit for me for a Saturday date night and she's been always available for me. My kids love her! They look forward for their "Kathia fun night" she's very fun and she always has a smile on her face. She's very reliable and I know that my kids are safe and they are enjoying their time with her. If you chose to work with her you won't regret at all.

description.displayText: Kathia is fun loving happy girl who my kids love.  She always has a smile on her face and is up for anything, which would make her a great fit in any setting.  In addition to being fun, Kathia is very nurturing & caring.  I always felt safe and secure leaving my kids with Kathia.  During the time she spent with us my children formed a strong bond with Kathia and still talk about her to this day.
